item.title: Do College Matter?
item.description: Archive post from my newsletter. letter #1 Dear reader, This is my first letter from my newsletter indication. I created this newsletter a year ago, but never felt ready enough to send out a letter. Waiting for the perfect moment can wait now. ;) This is my newsletter and not my twitter, so I’ll blast my subjective perceptions to space here. (that’s the nicest word I could find for my shitty opinions), I am also bad at writing and known for making a lot of grammatical mistakes, I no longer make spelling mistakes, thanks to the pointy red lines.
